group_1.textLeft: I heard from the daughter of the head family.
It seems that the Hiroe girl gained a very @troublesome power...
I'd like to request this of you, but if you've gotten @attached to them, you won't be of any use.
I can't rely on you if you just act like a little girl, @after all.

group_1.textRight: Then, how are we going to@eliminate Chiharu Hiroe...?

group_1.textLeft: If we simply leave her alone,@the shadows ought to devour her.
But if the daughter of the head family@steps in to protect her again...
Then that's it. You shall have@to eliminate them both...
